name: @tanqory/javascript-style-guide
description: Tanqory's modern JavaScript style guide - A comprehensive approach to JavaScript development.

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config:base
scripts.install:config: cd packages/eslint-config-airbnb && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:base: cd packages/eslint-config-airbnb-base && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: npm run --silent test:config && npm run --silent test:config:base
scripts.travis: npm run --silent travis:config && npm run --silent travis:config:base

author: Tanqory <dev@tanqory.com> (https://tanqory.com)
